title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC
created_time: February 22, 2023, 12:40:42 PMLast edit: February 22, 2023, 12:54:23 PM by MoparMiningLLC
content: Up for Auction I have 4 of the Genesis Loaded LTC and Dash coins.  Each LTC coin is funded with .5 LTC and the DASH coin is funded with .25 Dash1. #113 of 125 - .25 DASH MS682. #99 of 125 - .5 LTC MS683. #30 of 40 - .5 LTC MS674. #67 of 125 .5 LTC MS66Auction Terms:Auction is for 1 lot of all 4 coinsStarting Bid:  0 BTCBid Increments:  0.0005 BTC please keep to 4 decimal placesAuction Ends:  Tuesday, 28 February 2023 @ 3pm ESTSniping:  A bid in the final 10 minutes adds 10 minutes to the end of the auction time, this continues until no bid has been made for 10 minutesExcluded from Bidding:   I may exclude/disqualify bidders, or require a deposit, for any bidders at my sole discretion.  Shipping:  At cost in addition to the winning bid.  Ships from USA.  Buyer responsible for any local customs/duties. Can also be sent to minerjones for consolidated reshipping.Payment due within 24 hours of auction closing and in BTC to address: bc1qn37ly2yjla0thlnfsverzezrvxtxdsyvecp4es

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: in looking at my pictures, I apologize for their dusty appearance - they were sitting on the display shelf - later I will dust them off and replace with some better pictures.

comments.author: tweetious
comments.body: 0.001BTCQuote from: MoparMiningLLC on February 22, 2023, 12:40:42 PMSniping:  Each bid in the final 150 minutes adds 10 minutes until no bid has been made for 10 minutesCould you please elaborate? If 10 bids (for example) will be placed within the last 150 minutes, will that add 100 minutes to the ending time?

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: tweetious on February 22, 2023, 12:49:30 PM0.001BTCQuote from: MoparMiningLLC on February 22, 2023, 12:40:42 PMSniping:  Each bid in the final 150 minutes adds 10 minutes until no bid has been made for 10 minutesCould you please elaborate? If 10 bids (for example) will be placed within the last 150 minutes, will that add 100 minutes to the ending time?typo - 10 mins not 150, corrected - I hope that clarifies.

comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on February 22, 2023, 12:53:41 PMQuote from: tweetious on February 22, 2023, 12:49:30 PM0.001BTCQuote from: MoparMiningLLC on February 22, 2023, 12:40:42 PMSniping:  Each bid in the final 150 minutes adds 10 minutes until no bid has been made for 10 minutesCould you please elaborate? If 10 bids (for example) will be placed within the last 150 minutes, will that add 100 minutes to the ending time?typo - 10 mins not 150, corrected - I hope that clarifies.thanks!BTW, layers of dust prolly add character to the items (similar to an old bottle of wine) & also further protect them from external light. Let the winners decide if they want them cleaned or not....    (do not take me seriously, I am just joking around)
